forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 37F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low -3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 27F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain with some snow mixing in late. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain with some snow mixing in late. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 36F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing late. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with a few snow showers late. Low around 25F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 20F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early, then some snow showers later in the day. High -1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning followed by periods of snow showers later in the day. High near 30F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. High 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. High 37F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 34F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain showers late. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers mixed in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy with a mixture of rain and snow showers developing in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening will become rain and snow showers in the overnight hours. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the overnight hours. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.
